itunes:title: John Week 1 with Jon Tyson
title: John Week 1 with Jon Tyson
description:
Kick off your new year in the Gospel of John with Raechel, Amanda, and author, pastor, and church planter, Jon Tyson. Whether engaging in conversation about prioritizing consistency in the small things or sitting in wonder of the way God has revealed Himself to us, Raechel, Amanda, and Jon never fail to point us to the fullness, joy, and hope found only in Jesus Christ. Throughout the episode, join these three in responding to the hopeful invitation of John’s Gospel to “come and see” who Jesus is as we begin to dig into this Gospel. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth John reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop the John collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/john-week-1-with-jon-tyson
